channel.title: Mary Renault on
channel.description: Recent content in Mary Renault on

item.title: The Last of the Wine
item.description: So very good. Here I was thinking the writing style kept me at a remove from the story and I wasn’t as invested as I could be, and then the last two chapters walloped me in the gut and I realized it had me at the emotional level after all.

item.title: The Mask of Apollo
item.description: I’m reserving five stars because Alexander shows up at the end and whoa, I want to see what she does with his books. But it’s a marvel. The best of Renault’s I’ve read yet? Thettalos is my fave.
